recipesJson.name: Cinnamon Roll Apple Danish
recipesJson.author: ID10-T
recipesJson.description: 1% Dragonfruit makes the Fuji and CDS taste more like a danish with cinnamon apple filling. Without it, this just tastes like a cinnamon danish with apple slices on top.

reviews.text: I rated this recipe for you having the balls to use Capella cinnamon danish Swirl @ such a high percentage.  I left out the apple not a big fan and mixed the remaining flavors this is a perfectly balanced C.D.S a wonderful base recipe utilizing this concentrate üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç also I wanted to thank you for rating my "RY4 Stone base recipe  that one was well thought out thanks to me getting over my stubbornness and actually watching "Noted" and taking your advice on flavor notes and not just throwing shit in the mix just because I think it would workü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è....üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç
I let this one steep a month, and I was very pleased with the outcome.  The cinnamon is not too strong, even with the high percentage of Cinnamon Danish Swirl.

I mixed this because 6% Cap Cinnamon Danish Swirl. I have never seen it used this high before, and was interested to see how it would work out. I thought it seemed ham fisted but somehow it works. Why is there 1% TPA VBIC? I don't know but it just works. I'd be  interested to see how FA Liquid Amber would affect the mix. Great job.
Absolutely fantastic recipe that matches the profile perfectly. Every element is present and balanced. Definitely benefits from a long steep.
God, that was a painful wait for 2  weeks. But so worth it! It's amazing. The apple sits right on top of that cinnamon danish. So satisfying.
This is so good. And usually I find many DIY recipes to be garbage

If I had a go to profile that I could probably vape the rest of my life, it would probably be an apple/cinnamon combo. It was one of the first profiles that really hooked me when I started vaping and nothing has changed. /u/ID10-T 's recipe is absolutely delicious, and I'm glad I finally got around to mixing it. Not everybody like's the taste of Dragonfruit, but man it really makes Apple/Cinnamon Combo's sing, and this recipe is no different. It's sitting in my U-Well Fancier right now and I can't get enough of it.
Solid recipe after a 2 week steep everything blends together nicely
I love this stuff, I mixed this up almost a year ago when I first started diy. Decided to mix this up again and it's a really great combination with the CDS and Fuji.
This is a great recipe, thank you.  I have mixed this up multiple times now, and I am always carrying some with me.  The flavors are balanced really well.
Awesome recipe, thanks for sharing!  I wasn't sure how the dragonfruit would be but everything comes together perfectly!

This is a solid recipe. Real smooth, with a good fruit:danish balance. Very light on the cream note, it just sort of smoothes out the apple component. Light enough to be an all-day liquid, but the flavor does not fade after repeated vaping. Great recipe! Thanks for sharing!
